title: a bit of humor
content:
Did you hear about the typographer who didn't believe in angels?

All his typefaces were sans seraph.

\*rimshot\* \*cue groans\*
author: ChristTrekker

comments.content: I don't know if the fact that I can't laugh at most of these typographic jokes means I don't have humor or you don't. Either way it makes me realize typographers are odd people.
